refnamediv.refpurpose: convert a Plot3 stream to ASCII

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Reads a stream in plot35 format and converts it to an ASCII representation. Standard input is read if a file name is not supplied. If the -v option is given, the single-character command names are replaced with mnemonic strings and a summary of plot command usage is written to standard error.

refsect1.title: SEE ALSO
refsect1.para: asc-pl1, pl-pl1, plrot1, pl-fb1, libplot33, plot35
